name: BLACKPINK
description: BLACKPINK is a global girl group known for their powerful performances, fashion influence, and record-breaking achievements.

funFacts: Lead actress in K-drama 'Snowdrop' (2021-2022)
Known for her '4D' quirky personality
Loves video games especially PUBG and Overwatch
Has a unique way of eating - 'Jisoo way'
Trained for 5 years before debuting
members.bio: Jisoo is BLACKPINK's eldest member and visual. Despite her stunning looks, she's known for her hilarious '4D' personality and gaming skills. She expanded into acting with the lead role in 'Snowdrop' and released her solo album 'ME' in 2023.

funFacts: Lived in New Zealand for 5 years during childhood
First BLACKPINK member to debut solo with 'SOLO' (2018)
Global ambassador for Chanel, earning 'Human Chanel' nickname
Known for her duality - fierce on stage, cute off stage
Her cat's name is Kuma
members.bio: Jennie is BLACKPINK's main rapper and a fashion icon. Having studied abroad in New Zealand, she's fluent in English and known for her versatile talents. She became the first member to go solo with the hit 'SOLO' and is Chanel's global ambassador.

funFacts: Born in New Zealand, raised in Australia
Her solo 'On The Ground' broke multiple records
Known for her unique, husky vocal tone
Plays guitar and piano
First Korean solo artist to reach #1 on Billboard Global 200
members.bio: Ros√© is BLACKPINK's main vocalist with a distinctive, emotive voice. Born in New Zealand and raised in Melbourne, Australia, she brings a unique tone to the group. Her solo debut 'R' featured hits like 'On The Ground' and 'Gone.'

funFacts: Only Thai member, from Buriram Province
Most-followed K-pop idol on Instagram (100M+)
Solo song 'LALISA' MV got 73.6M views in 24 hours (record)
Won 'Best K-Pop' at 2022 VMAs for 'LALISA'
Known for her incredible dance covers and versatility
members.bio: Lisa is BLACKPINK's main dancer and the only non-Korean member. Originally from Thailand, she's become one of the most influential K-pop idols globally with the most Instagram followers. Her solo debut 'LALISA' broke multiple YouTube records.

seo.title: BLACKPINK Name Generator | Create Your Korean Name with BLINK
seo.description: Create your BLACKPINK name with Jennie, Jisoo, Ros√© & Lisa! Get instant chemistry scores and Korean stage names. Perfect for BLINK fanfiction and roleplay.
